content: STI ETF Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Nov 2018Apart from buying STI ETF with $100 monthly (RSP), what other option worth investing which might give better return over long period (5yrs and above)?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 05 Nov 2018Depending on how much you are willing to invest. For $100 per month, you can look at different types of ETFs (commodities, equities, reits...) in foreign markets or use robo-advisors which can help you customise a diversified portfolio. SSB provides relatively well returns with it being guaranteed, although cannot compare to that of stocks. 0 comments0
